name: Test Project: Rise of Dead Memes

description:
A World Where Forgotten And Dead Memes Rise And Finally having revenge you are here on this world trying to escape! But you only have a pistol! Survive The Campaigns 

*NOTE* THIS IS REALLY EARLY DEVELOPMENT SO EVERYTHING HERE IS BAD AND GOING TO BE CHANGED AND WILL BE LOT OF BUGS SO PLEASE DONT LEAVE A COOMENT AND BAD RATING CAUSE OF IT*NOTE*

THERES ONLY "TWO"(one) ENEMY CURRENTLY

THERE WILL BE MORE ENEMYS AND MORE THIS IS REALLY EARLY DEVELOPMENT
